Title: Relates to the tampon safety and research act
Summary: Relates to the tampon safety and research act and its creation of a research program to determine the risks posed from potential toxins in feminine hygiene products.
LawCode: Add ยง268, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the creation of a research program to determine the risks posed from potential toxins in feminine hygiene products; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
